channel.title: Jezebel
channel.description: Jezebel: Celebrity, Sex, Fashion for Women. Without Airbrushing.

item.title: Last Night's Real Housewives of New York Was a Carnival Cruise of Bad Romances
item.description:
Wednesday night’s Real Housewives of New York was part two of the women’s three episode Florida trip, and while the big cliff hanger was Bethenny’s reveal that LuAnn’s fiancé Tom has been unfaithful, the countess and her new boo’s at-risk engagement was not the only bad relationship.

Read more...
item.category: the real housewives of new york
item.dc:creator: Madeleine Davies

item.title: The Grande Dame Who Collects History in One of New York's Oldest Homes
item.description:
Marion Duckworth Smith sometimes wears a gold pin on her blouse that reads “Lady Legacy.” This accessory, which was given to her in 2004 by Henry Stern of New York City’s Historic House Trust, is the first clue that she knows something about what can be preserved over time and what fades away.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Susan Harlan on Pictorial, shared by Kelly Faircloth to Jezebel

item.title: All 306 Olympic Medal Events, Ranked
item.description:
My friend Danny always says that the Olympics is a great opportunity to reflect upon how we have grown or regressed during the past four years. Four years ago I was working for NBC during the Olympics. I was getting paid thousands of dollars to watch television. My office was the Saturday Night Live writer’s room. If I swiveled my chair around, I had a clear view of the SNL stage. If I was feeling tired, I could walk downstairs and get free coffee on the eighth floor of 30 Rock, from the Starbucks NBC had built just for the Olympics so we wouldn’t have to leave the building.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Akiva Wienerkur on Deadspin, shared by Emma Carmichael to Jezebel

item.title: Barack Obama Is the Latest Dad Feminist
item.description:
In a piece published Thursday by Glamour, President Barack Obama reiterated his commitment to feminism and to calling himself a feminist. “It’s important that their dad is a feminist,” Obama wrote, referring to his daughters Sasha and Malia, “because now that’s what they expect of all men.”

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Stassa Edwards on The Slot, shared by Kate Dries to Jezebel

item.title: A Senior Center Threw $500,000 Back in Roger Ailes' Face
item.description:
In a shocking upset, senior citizens have refused pandering from someone connected to Fox News. Over 400 residents in the Hudson Valley have signed a petition to refuse half a million dollars from Roger Ailes for their center.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Aimée Lutkin

item.title: Tinder for Threesomes Got Totally Boned, Moves on
item.description:
Tinder recently went to war with 3nder, an app designed to help users find some three-person fun. Tinder’s primary complaint was the similarity between the two names—3nder, evidently, was just too close to Tinder. 3nder disputed this at the time, but now, in what appears to be an effort to duck the thorny legal issues, 3nder has rebranded as “Feeld.”

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Sophie Kleeman on Gizmodo, shared by Joanna Rothkopf to Jezebel

item.title: Amy Schumer Was Bummed When Her Ex Turned Out to Be Gay
item.description:
In a excerpt from Amy Schumer’s upcoming book The Girl With The Lower Back Tattoo, Amy Schumer describes the most “sacred” night of her life: a one night stand.

Read more...
item.category: the girl with the lower back tattoo
item.dc:creator: Aimée Lutkin

item.title: Get Twice the Color for Half the Price with Bite Beauty's Perfect Pair Lip Kit
item.description:
Bite Beauty’s High Pigment Pencils may play second fiddle to their lipstick bullets, but that doesn’t mean they aren’t fantastic. Similar to their sold out Lipstick Trio , this Limited Edition Perfect Pair comes with two pencils (in either Rhubarb & Chablis, or Quince & Tannin) and is only $14. That’s almost half of a regularly priced pencil, for twice the color.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Jillian Lucas on Deals, shared by Jillian Lucas to Jezebel

item.title: Sources: "Dumb-Dumb" Trump to Blame For Campaign Disarray
item.description:
Speaking under the condition of anonymity, sources familiar with the Donald Trump campaign revealed to Gawker their many frustrations with the campaign’s current path. One source even went so far as to venture, “He’s probably going to lose.”

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Ashley Feinberg on Gawker, shared by Emma Carmichael to Jezebel

item.title: Searching For the Country Music of Our Dreams in Nashville
item.description:
“Everyone here’s a fucking idiot,” says Wheeler Walker, Jr., of the artists and fans flocking to the 2016 CMT Awards. Evidence of this idiocy lies in the fact that his album isn’t selling nearly as well as (for example) Blake Shelton’s, even though Walker—unlike just about everyone else in the building, he explains—is a real country singer.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Mairead Small Staid

item.title: Britney Spears Tries Something New With 'Private Show'
item.description:
Really cool woman and master prankster Britney Spears will release her ninth album later this month. It’s called Glory and is a collection of emotionally stirring tracks written by John Legend and Common—oh wait, no, it’s just more pop.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Bobby Finger on The Muse, shared by Emma Carmichael to Jezebel

item.title: Ansel Elgort Is Playing Twins in a Film. That's TWO Ansel Elgorts!
item.description:
Ansel Elgort, also known as DJ Ansolo, has signed on to play twins in an indie film titled Jonathan. This news is amusingly torturous.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Clover Hope

item.title: USA Gymnastics Accused of Enabling Predators By Ignoring Abuse Allegations
item.description:
In 2013, a lawsuit was filed against USA Gymnastics, the national governing body for U.S. gymnastics that is responsible for selecting teams for the Olympics and World Championships. The lawsuit accused the organization of neglecting to adequately report the abuse allegations coming from its gyms, leading to the continued sexual abuse by coaches on young gymnasts.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Aimée Lutkin

item.title: Today's Best Lifestyle Deals: H&M, PUMA, Babeland, Nordstrom Rack, and More
item.description:
A $99 Jimmy Jane bundle, Nordstrom Rack dress sale, reduced accessories at H&M, Back-to-School sales at PUMA , and more lead Thursday’s best lifestyle deals.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Jillian Lucas on Deals, shared by Jillian Lucas to Jezebel

item.title: How Wack Is Nicki Minaj's Ex Safaree in the Love & Hip-Hop Hollywood Trailer
item.description:
“Yo, wha a gwan. It’s Safaree” is how Nicki Minaj’s ex Safaree Samuels introduces himself, via Jamaican patois, in a trailer for Love & Hip-Hop Hollywood’s next season which doubles as confirmation that Minaj dodged a bullet.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Clover Hope on The Muse, shared by Julianne Escobedo Shepherd to Jezebel

item.title: President Obama Goes Out in Historic Blaze, Grants 214 Clemency
item.description:
Barack Obama earned a new presidential record by commuting the sentences of 214 people this week, the highest number of shortened sentences in one day since 1900, according to a White House press release.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Hillary Crosley Coker

item.title: Thank Christ, It Looks Like Poldark Is Axing a Controversial Rape Scene From the Books
item.description:
In a media climate full of hotly debated adaptations, remakes, and reinterpretations, here is a reminder—in the form of a major spoiler from the TV show Poldark—that not only can you deviate from the source material, but sometimes you should, if you don’t want to completely derail the story for a modern audience.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Kelly Faircloth on The Muse, shared by Julianne Escobedo Shepherd to Jezebel

item.title: Muslim Passengers on Two Airlines Say They Were Kicked Off Flights Due to 'Uncomfortable' Attendants
item.description:
Muslim passengers who recently flew on both Delta and American Airlines say they were removed from flights after being told attendants were “uncomfortable” with them remaining onboard. The two women removed from American work for the federal government.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Anna Merlan

item.title: Did Melania Trump Lie About Her Visa Status, And Wouldn't That Be Delightfully Ironic?
item.description:
Melania Trump, wife of the poster monster for legal immigration for nonthreatening Europeans, may not have followed the letter of the law when she immigrated to the United States in the ‘90s, according to a new report from Politico.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Joanna Rothkopf on The Slot, shared by Anna Merlan to Jezebel

item.title: Have a story idea or some information you think we should know?
item.description:
Have a story idea or some information you think we should know? Email us at tips@jezebel.com, contact one of our writers directly, or use our SecureDrop system. You can also follow us on Twitter and Instagram, like us on Facebook, and subscribe to our newsletter.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Jezebel Staff

item.title: 20-Year-Old Witch Makes Matt Lauer Cry
item.description:
Tyler Henry, the 20-year-old star of Hollywood Medium, recently sat in a room with NBC’s Matt Lauer and contacted his dead father—or so he says! As someone who thinks Henry is a con artist who preys on—no, exploits!—the grief-stricken, I believe he just sat in a room with NBC’s Matt Lauer and put on a performance that wouldn’t even have been good enough for a People’s Choice nomination.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Bobby Finger

item.title: How To Watch the Olympics Without Cable
item.description:
The Olympics is a once every four-year event testing the limits of humanity’s athletic ability—more so this year as competitors compete in raw sewage . It’s safer for viewers at home, but for those without cable, it’s also a marathon of ingenuity and clever thinking to even watch it.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Darren Orf on Gizmodo, shared by Kate Dries to Jezebel

item.title: GOP Strategist Calls Donald Trump a 'Loudmouthed Dick' on Live TV
item.description:
GOP communications expert and media advisor Liz Mair communicated clearly and successfully on CNN Wednesday, calling Donald Trump a “loudmouthed dick” live on air. I see no lies here.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Anna Merlan on The Slot, shared by Joanna Rothkopf to Jezebel

item.title: There's No Reason Not to Pounce On PUMA's Back-to-School Sale
item.description:
With a 20% off your purchase when you use the code BACK2SCHOOL, PUMA’s Back-to-School Sale could score you two pairs of sneakers for the price of one. Apparel, bags and accessories, workout gear, even sale items are also included in this discount. Just add the code and watch the numbers drop.

Read more...
item.dc:creator: Jillian Lucas on Deals, shared by Jillian Lucas to Jezebel

item.description:
